content: The data type for the preferred terminology server extension appears to be uri, not url, as I would have thought. If it is just a URI, how do you use it? Somehow you need to get the URL of the terminology server so you can access it.
@Grahame Grieve Did we make an error? Should it be a URL?
Didn't notice the datatype issue there, but yes, my expectation is that this is the base URL for the terminology server.
@Grahame Grieve any reason to allow anything other than a URL?
